EmailTemplate.name: SD_Survey-NonUsingClients
EmailTemplate.subject: Supply Desk: Your Feedback is Important to Us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
At Supply Desk we are constantly trying to improve our customer service and offer new and innovative solutions to s schools.
We would be grateful if you could complete a short survey by clicking on the link below and, as a thank you, we will gift a Â£100 Amazon voucher to 5 randomly selected respondents.
To ensure you will be included in the prize draw, just make sure to complete your school's details at the beginning of the survey and answer every questions. It will take no more than 20 mins to complete.
To complete the survey, please click here.
Kind Regards,
Supply Desk Team
